boardgame.description: A forgotten evil stirs in the ancient land of Varisia. Dark magic once more thrums amid crumbling ruins, giants gather in titanic armies, cultists murder in the name of foul deities, and maniacal goblins plot a fiery end for the peaceful town of Sandpoint._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Launch a campaign to strike back against the evils plaguing Varisia with the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Rise of the Runelords - Base Set. This complete cooperative strategy card game pits 1 to 4 heroes against the traps, monsters, deadly magic, and despicable foes of the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game's award-winning Rise of the Runelords Adventure Path. In this game players take the part of a fantasy character such as a rogue or wizard, each with varying skills and proficiencies that are represented by the cards in their deck. The classic ability scores (Strength, Dexterity, etc.) are assigned with different sized dice. Players can acquire allies, spells, weapons, and other items. The goal is to find and defeat a villain before a certain number of turns pass, with the villain being represented by its own deck of cards complete with challenges and foes that must be overcome. Characters grow stronger after each game, adding unique gear and awesome magic to their decks, and gaining incredible powers, all of which they'll need to challenge greater threats in a complete Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Adventure Path._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Pathfinder Adventure Card Game is an expandable game, with the first set containing nearly 500 cards. The Rise of the Runelords - Base Set supports 1 to 4 players; a 110-card Character Add-On Deck expands the possible number of players to 5 or 6 and adds more character options for any number of players. The game will be expanded with bimonthly 110-card adventure decks._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Errata: Early printings had the Loot card _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Sihedron Medallion_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; listed as belonging to _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;B_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (for Base Set). It is instead supposed to read _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (for Burnt Offerings ). (It is unknown if this has been fixed in later printings)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Paizo Publishing (PZO6000) An Adventure Like No Other! A forgotten evil stirs in the ancient land of Varisia. Dark magic once more thrums amid crumbling ruins, giants gather in titanic armies, cultists murder in the name of foul deities, and maniacal goblins plot a fiery end for the peaceful town of Sandpoint. Launch a campaign to strike back against the evils plaguing Varisia with the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Rise of the Runelords Base Set. This complete cooperative strategy card game pits 1 to 4 heroes against the traps, monsters, deadly magic, and despicable foes of the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s award-winning Rise of the Runelords Adventure Path. Choose your character_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s class; build a deck of allies, equipment, and magic; and explore lethal locations as you journey through multiple scenarios in an exciting fantasy adventure. Characters grow stronger after each game, adding unique gear and awesome magic to their decks, and gaining incredible powers, all of which they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll need to challenge greater threats in a complete Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Adventure Path.

I will include the character add-on deck for an extra $10! Hello! I am selling a once-played copy of the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game (and barely played at that--I did not even complete my solo session before I realized this was, unfortunately, not the game for me). This copy INCLUDES EXTRA COOL STUFF: 4 copies of a quick reference card, 2 copies of a front/back rules reference sheet and 2 copies of a different version rules reference sheet, as well as printouts of all 11 character reference cards available at Paizo.com (otherwise, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be writing on your cards). These sheets and the instruction booklet I have placed into a new folder that stores neatly in the box. Additionally, I have separately bagged each of the card types and the 5 dice in 4mil game baggies. I haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t even opened the included _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Burnt Offerings_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Adventure Pack #1 that is included in the base game. Again, if you would like to purchase the character add-on deck as well, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll throw it in for an extra $10. Additionally, I have clear-taped the corners of the box with Scotch Brand packing tape to prevent corner wear over a long life of play (completely invisible but a useful trick) and I have already repacked the game in the original well-fitting Amazon.com box with original air bag packing, and included extra packing for a safe trip. Please contact me if interested and note that buyer will pay shipping (I will ship whatever method is preferred, box dimensions are 17.5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;x14.5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;x8.5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and it is approximately 4.5lbs). Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Complete Set! Despite the listing title/categories, what I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m actually selling here is the complete set of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Rise of the Runelords_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; for the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game. Also, aside from the base set and all six adventures, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m including several add-ons, promos, and accessories. The copy you will receive has seen plenty of play, however as described below, all cards have always been sleeved and protected. All game pieces included have minor--if any--wear. The game box is in great shape and includes a custom fit, wooden, insert to organize all of the cards and components neatly within. Please, be sure to check out the rather lengthy list of everything included below and also the pictures I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve added to this listing! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- EVERYTHING INCLUDED: x1 Rise of the Runelords Character Add-On Deck x1 Rise of the Runelords Base Set(includes Adventure Deck 1: Burnt Offerings) x1 Adventure Deck 2: Skinsaw Murders x1 Adventure Deck 3: Hook Mountain Massacre x1 Adventure Deck 4: Fortress of Stone Giants x1 Adventure Deck 5: Sins of the Saviors x1 Adventure Deck 6: Spires of Xin-Shalast (This is the base set and every adventure for the entire _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Rise of the Runelords_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; adventure set. It also includes a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Character Add-On_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; pack which adds more playable heroes to the game--along with some other neat stuff.) Promos: x2 Fire Sneeze x1 Poog of Zarongel x1 Blessing of Zarongel x1 Dance with Squealy Nord x1 Birdcruncher Crown x1 Grindylow x1 Horsechopper +1 x1 Goblin Plate +1 (This is a COMPLETE set of the promos that released with the original Rise of the Runelords adventure set--along with an extra Fire Sneeze. Typically from my experience, these were only given out if you had a subscription through Paizo or during conventions.) Accessories: * Wooden Organizer Insert w/ adjustable slots * x11 Player Mats(individually themed for all eleven Heroes sold within this set) * 15 Die (x3 D4, x3 D6, x3 D8, x3 D10, x3 D12) * Fully sleeved - The grand majority of cards here are sleeved with Dragon Shields(black). Any double-sided cards(such as Hero sheet cards) are sleeved with penny sleeves. Official Pathfinder Collectible Minis: Valeros - Beginner Box - #1/4 Ezren - Beginner Box - #2/4 Kyra - Beginner Box - #3/4 Merisiel - Beginner Box - #4/4 Lem - Shattered Star - #38/55 Amiri - Shattered Star - #39/55 Harsk - Rise of the Runelords - #25/65 Seoni - Rise of the Runelords - #35/65 Lini - Legends of Golarion - #38/55 Sajan - Legends of Golarion - #44/55 Seelah - Heroes _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Monsters - #27/40 (Basically, there is a miniature for every playable hero included within this game. Aside from being awesome minis, these are what I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve used as Hero tokens instead of the card tokens that are included by default. For reference purposes, they are listed by the miniature_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s name, the set they come from, and their numbering within that set.) ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ***PAYMENT INFO*** Paypal only. Supplemental information will be provided upon purchase. ***SHIPPING INFO*** Shipping ONLY to the US, sorry! I will ship this through USPS Priority Mail, which will include tracking. The cost for shipping has already been factored into the asking price--there will be absolutely no additional cost added for shipping. If you have ANY questions, please feel free to shoot me a message. Thanks for checking out my listing!
